text: Buhalterės.lt is a Lithuanian accounting and consulting company founded in 2010 in Vilnius by Laimis Jančiūnas and Asta Smilingė. It offers accounting, company establishment, financial consulting, and legal services. == History == Buhalterės.lt was founded in Vilnius, Lithuania on 21 September 2010 by Laimis Jančiūnas and Asta Smilingė as Bonus socius UAB ("good partner" in Latin), after the economic crisis of 2008-2009, when companies needed to reduce their accounting costs. In 2014, it became a member of the Lithuanian Association of Accountants and Auditors. In 2018, it joined the Vilnius Chamber of Commerce, Industry and Crafts. On 14 February 2020, the company changed its name from Bonus socius, UAB, to Buhalterės.lt, UAB. In 2022, Buhalterės.lt automated the sale of accounting services and moved the contract signing process to its website. In 2023, it became a member of the Association of Lithuanian Accounting Firms. == Operations == Buhalterės.lt specializes in accounting, company establishment in Lithuania and Europe, financial consulting, and legal services. It has received awards such as the Strongest in Lithuania certificate and the Gazelle award for fast growth. It is known for its expertise in the field and its contributions to media channels. == References == Category:2010 establishments in Europe Category:Establishments in Lithuania Category:Companies of Lithuania
title: Buhalterės.lt
